description: Paul Canon walks into his room to find a note from former teammate, Tom, explaining that he was kicked out of school for being such a slut. Bennett Anthony then comes in to see if Paul has heard the news. Bennett asks Paul if he ever fucked his hunky old roommate which Paul is just too shy to admit. In any case, Bennett was just looking for an opportunity to get Paul alone so he could fuck his tight ass and taste his fresh load.
title: Cross Check Part 2
